remarks: A collection of classes ` B ( x ) ` is disjoint when for each element ` y ` , it is in ` B ( x ) ` for at most one ` x ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
df-disj $p |- ( Disj_ x e. A B <-> A. y E* x e. A y e. B ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d x y $.
